IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K43') BEGIN INSERT INTO [w2_Payment] ( [shop_id], [payment_group_id], [payment_id], [payment_alt_id], [payment_name], [payment_name_mobile], [payment_price_kbn], [payment_price], [usable_price_min], [usable_price_max], [mobile_disp_flg], [display_order], [valid_flg], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed], [user_management_level_not_use], [order_owner_kbn_not_use] ) VALUES ( N'0', '', 'K43', '', 'ネットバンキング決済', '', 0, 0, 0, Null, 0, 10, 0, 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', '', '' ) END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K43') BEGIN INSERT INTO [w2_PaymentPrice] ( [shop_id], [payment_group_id], [payment_id], [payment_price_no], [tgt_price_bgn], [tgt_price_end], [payment_price], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed] ) VALUES ( N'0', '', 'K43', 1, 0, 0, 1, N'0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー' ) END GO
